content.rendered:
Directed by Masayuki Suô. Hiroshi Gokan. Shôzô Katashima. Akira Shinohara. Sakura Ueki

Written by Shôzô Katashima. Keiko Kanome

Cast Shôno Hayama( Ryota Moriyama10 episodes, 2022 ). Rikka Ihara( Honoka Oba10 episodes, 2022 ). Takeru Bulkley( Student 81 episode, 2022 ). Honoka Oka(unknown episodes ). Ryuta Morikawa(unknown episodes )

Language Japanese

Producers Shôji Masui

Production Altamira Pictures Inc.

Season 1

Total Episodes 10
